author: Special Correspondent
text:
A four-year-old boy who went missing from Government school at Irulanchanthai was traced to a village near Chidambaram on Wednesday.

The boy’s parents of Irulanchanthai lodged police complaint on Tuesday that their son who is studying LKG , has not returned from the school and said his whereabouts were unknown. A special team that was formed found the boy at the residence of one Babu who is known to the family in Uthamacholapuram village, near Chidambaram. But, Babu was absconding.
title: Missing boy traced
